overview: David Canniff, Chief Financial Officer, joined INSPIRIS in November 2009 bringing with him over 20 years of senior financial and operational leadership. David started his healthcare career with Cardinal Health where he was the group controller for Cardinalâ€™s Pharmaceutical Distribution Division. In 2000, he was promoted to Vice President and General Manager for Cardinalâ€™s Specialty Pharmaceutical Distribution Division. Following Cardinalâ€™s sale of the specialty division to Oncology Holdings, he was named Chief Financial Officer for Oncology Holdings, a portfolio company of One Equity Partners. In 2007, Oncology Holdings was sold to McKesson Corporation where he was appointed Vice President of Finance. David earned a B.S. degree from Merrimack College and was a former Certified Public Accountant with Deloitte Haskins & Sells.
